title: Can I recite 2 incomplete surahs in one rakah (In Taraweeh) #ramadan #islam #islamic assim al hakeem
transcript: Shake uh so my question is uh because uh odd nights are coming the last 10 nights then uh can I while praying my t uh recite two suras while both of the suras I don't remember uh fully but it would help me to prolong my prayer in one Raa no problem inshallah you try your level best not to make mistakes
